description: Retrieves information about the specified resource gateway.

parameters.name: resourceGatewayIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the resource gateway was created, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The type of IP address for the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the resource gateway was last updated, in ISO-8601 format.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The security group IDs associated with the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status for the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the VPC subnets for resource gateway.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC for the resource gateway.
